title: 0 A.D. - Staying Alive While Fighting Seven Opponents
description:
0 A.D. is my favorite game.  It is a real-time strategy game and it is free and open source software.  Today, I'm just having a little fun playing an 8-player free-for-all match, which will feature me and 7 very hard A.I. opponents.  Let's see how this goes.

REFERENCED:
► https://play0ad.com/
